documents.document: @NicolaSturgeon @scotgov Nicola Sturgeon doing what she always does. @dharmabum013 @STVNews Of course. But I'd love to know how many people expressing outrage at the shooting of that goat will sit down to a dinner tonight of chicken, ham, beef or pork and not give those animals a second thought? I'd wager that goat had a better life than they did.

@STVNews I don't agree with it but it's less barbaric than rearing animals, driving them 100s of miles to be slaughtered then being stunned and having their throats slit. People seem angrier about a goat being shot than they do about millions of animals being slaughtered every week.

@ScotNational There are newspapers in North Korea that are more objective than the National. When it started it was a voice for the indy movement. Now it's just a propaganda rag for the SNP.
It's a shame to see it's gone this way.
@NotoriousCeltic @macbreeza Given that it's a parody account clearly set up to take the piss out of the SNP and indy supporters I wouldn't be letting it make my blood boil.

It's shameful to watch the SNP & Labour blaming each other for failures in local gov't that led to today's strike when they're both as guilty as each other. The SNP has slashed local spending for years & Labour let those women down while in control of Glasgow council. Disgraceful
@NicolaSturgeon @theSNP @SusaninLangside Are you going to apologies for slashing local authority spending for nearly every year you've been in power?

@jegteg @TonyKennyAye @RonaldMcCallum1 @trophybhoy @ValladolidBhoy How about we just agree that Scottish Labour are guilty of refusing to pay these women their dues when they were in control of the council and the SNP are guilty of slashing local council spending during their time in power? They're both as bad as each other.
@jegteg @EFM_1 @PiersPd0930 @patrickharvie @Allan4Govan @GMBScotOrg I want it scrapped. Just like the SNP said they would do 11 years ago ðŸ˜‹
@jegteg @EFM_1 @PiersPd0930 @patrickharvie @Allan4Govan @GMBScotOrg And, if it wasn't for the Greens at the last budget, local council spending would have been cut even further.

@jegteg @EFM_1 @PiersPd0930 @patrickharvie @Allan4Govan @GMBScotOrg Not you too, Jim. Don't be like the rest of the SNP apologists. They froze council tax as a voting incentive. That's fair enough. It was their choice as the party in power. But froze it they did.

@daveweeden @BingoLittle75 That's the problem. It's all very well having laws in place but if they aren't going to be enforced or enforced properly what's the point?

Both parties are to blame for this mess.
@daveweeden @BingoLittle75 Pretty sure those already are criminal acts.

@jikdmmen @LollysMum1 @peacelove1967 @NicolaSturgeon @theSNP @SusaninLangside @theresa_may @labour Don't trust any of them to be honest. The SNP slash local budgets, Labour screw the workers, the Tories are inherently evil and the Lib Dems are about as much use as a eunuch in a sperm bank.

@TonyKennyAye Honestly, it looks like someone's accidentally logged into their work's Twitter account by mistake - but it's been happening for months now. Add to that their boycott of the Scottish Greens conference you wonder WTF is going on at that paper. Is Peter Murrell their new editor?
@soosider3 @brawday @patrickharvie @Allan4Govan @GMBScotOrg I agree. The SNP and Labour have a lot to answer for.

Has anyone ever seen the Twitter account of a newspaper tweet as if it's a supporter of a particular political party? This is the sort of tweet you'd expect from the likes of Peter Bell or Wings. https://t.co/2538sJA7A4

@brawday @patrickharvie @Allan4Govan @GMBScotOrg He's supporting the workers. Do you really want to go down this road? What happens next time an SNP MP, MSP or councillor campaigns alongside that union? (which they regularly do). Are you going to lambast them? This is just getting petty.
@PiersPd0930 @patrickharvie @Allan4Govan @GMBScotOrg Well, you're certainly coming across as a bit creepy. See ya.

@brawday @patrickharvie @Allan4Govan @GMBScotOrg And what's that got to do with Patrick showing solidarity with workers on strike? He hasn't blamed any party, including the SNP, so I fail to see why he's being rounded on by SNP supporters.
@PiersPd0930 @patrickharvie @Allan4Govan @GMBScotOrg My name's Scott. It says so. Why do you need to know my full name? Are you some sort of stalker?

@brawday @patrickharvie @Allan4Govan @GMBScotOrg In what way? Do you not expect him not to stand in solidarity with the strikers? Do you see anywhere in his tweet where he blames the SNP? What is it you have a problem with exactly?
@PiersPd0930 @patrickharvie @Allan4Govan @GMBScotOrg Oh, great comeback. Now, write SNPBAD! and go away and gies peace. https://t.co/EroiknVD53

@PiersPd0930 @patrickharvie @Allan4Govan @GMBScotOrg You asked where Patrick was when this was happening. He said so in a tweet above. Maybe it's time you stopped acting like a hysterical teenager every time you see something you (incorrectly) perceive to be SNPBad.
@PiersPd0930 @patrickharvie @Allan4Govan @GMBScotOrg And your point? Patrick said he campaigned for equal pay when Labour controlled Glasgow council so what's your point?
